ActivityMetadata.Name: PD Update a users notification rule
ActivityMetadata.Label: PD Update a users notification rule
ActivityMetadata.Description:
Update a user's notification rule.
Users are members of a PagerDuty account that have the ability to interact with Incidents and other data on the account.
For more information see the [API Concepts Document](../../docs/CONCEPTS.md#users)
ActivityMetadata.HelpHtml:
# PagerDuty

Update a user's notification rule

Update a user's notification rule. Users are members of a PagerDuty account that have the ability to interact with Incidents and other data on the account. For more information see the [API Concepts Document](../../docs/CONCEPTS.md#users)

Method: Put

OperationID: updateUserNotificationRule

EndPoint:

/users/{id}/notification_rules/{notification_rule_id}
